name: IELTS assessment criteria
description: Chord is the main part to handle a song to sounds good and feels awesome.There is a regulation system to manage and use chord well

name: Solo learning
description: Solo is called the harmony of a song that explains to feel the theme of a song.There are many process to gain various type of solo.

description: Plucking is another excellent items that sounds awesome and feels more awesome.This item is need to compose every song...so you should learn it

name: Guitar Scaling
description: There are seven types of basic scales in guitar music.You have to learn all of them to make approach to music world

name: Arpeggios for solo
description: An arpeggio is a broken chord, or a chord in which individual notes are struck one by one, rather than all together at once.

name: Guitar Rhythm
description: Therefore, the basic technique of rhythm guitar is to hold down a series of chords with the fretting hand while strumming or fingerpicking rhythmically with the other hand.

name: Exam main ielts
description: A guitar riff is a short repeatable idea used in a song. A guitar riff can be repeated over and over to form the main hook of a song, or it could be played only once in a song.

name: Ielts ext
description: Fingerstyle guitar is the technique of playing the guitar or bass guitar by plucking the strings directly with the fingertips, fingernails, or picks attached to fingers
